About

Hey there! I'm Anup Ghatage. I love to code and to do sleight of hand magic.
I specialize (or so I would like to think) in systems programming.

You can find my resume here.

My areas of interest include:
distributed systems, high availability and database internals
I have also dabbled in compiler internals and computer vision
Yes, I am all over the place.

I'm a University of Pune grad with a Masters Degree in Computer Science.
I worked at Sybase Inc. as a Kernel Engineer for Sybase's flagship database called 'Adaptive Server Enterprise'

Currently I am a graduate student at Carnegie Mellon University, studying Computer Science, Information Systems and Business.
